sentence.Network_en: A strange sympathy betwixt soul and body!
sentence.Network_cn: 这是灵魂和肉体之间一种奇妙的共鸣!

sentence.Network_en: Betwixt the stars and the unaccomplished fate.
sentence.Network_cn: 立即紧跟着,贴在它上面,挡在/那照临的星辰和未完功的命运间.

sentence.Network_en: It's difficult buying clothes for ten - year - olds at that age they're betwixt and between.
sentence.Network_cn: 很难给十 岁 的孩子买衣服--这种年龄说大不大,说小又不小.

list.abs: Иероглиф  - Словарь... ... 历历可数[ clearly count] 摸棱两可[ betwixt and between] 模棱两可[ double-talk;ambiguous].
...转换或阈限的阶段，这个阶段仪式主角什么都不是，具有模棱两可性（betwixt and between）；最后仪式主角再次处于稳定状态， …
thou wouldst set thy chair betwixt For and Against ?, 你想把你的椅子放在然否之间吗?

RelatedPhrase.word: The meal we had at the restaurant was rather betwixt and between

jx.jx_en_mean: In an intermediate position; neither wholly one thing nor another.
jx.jx_cn_mean: 模棱两可：处于中间位置；不全是这样也不全是那样

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English  betwēox, from be 'by' + a Germanic word related two

sentences.sentence: "dancing all the dances with little rest between"
